title: Restaurants' body seeks restoration of input tax credit, higher GST rate of 12 pc
description: The National Restaurant Association of India (NRAI) has called for the government to restore input tax credit to restaurants and increase the GST rate to 12% from the current 5%, ahead of the upcoming Union Budget. The association believes that balanced policies and regulations are needed to ensure a level playing field for restaurants, delivery partners, and consumers.
